00005 @implementation WaitUntilIdle
00006 
00007 @synthesize invocation;

00009 -(id)initWithTarget:(id)_target {
00010         if (self = [super initWithTarget:_target]) {
00011                 isIdle = NO;
00012                 [[NSNotificationCenter defaultCenter] addObserver:self selector:@selector(handleNotification:) name:[NSString stringWithFormat:@"IdleNotification%d", self.hash] object:nil];
00013         }
00014         return self;
00015 }
00016 
00017 -(void)handleNotification:(NSNotification *)notification {
00018         isIdle = YES;
00019 }
00020 
00021 - (void)forwardInvocation:(NSInvocation *)anInvocation {
00022         isIdle = NO;
00023         [[NSNotificationQueue defaultQueue] enqueueNotification:[NSNotification notificationWithName:[NSString stringWithFormat:@"IdleNotification%d", self.hash] object:nil] postingStyle:NSPostWhenIdle];
00024         NSDate *start = [NSDate date];
00025         while ([start timeIntervalSinceNow] > (0 - 10)) {
00026                 if (isIdle) {
00027                         break;
00028                 }
00029                 CFRunLoopRunInMode(kCFRunLoopDefaultMode, .0001, false);
00030         }
00031         [super forwardInvocation:anInvocation];
00032 }
00033 
00034 @end
